Uses of Class
io.grpc.Deadline.Ticker

  • Packages that use Deadline.Ticker 
    Package Description
    io.grpc
    The gRPC core public API.
    io.grpc.inprocess
    The in-process transport which is for when a server is in the same process as the client.

    • Uses of Deadline.Ticker in io.grpc

      Methods in io.grpc that return Deadline.Ticker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Deadline.Ticker Deadline.getSystemTicker()
      Returns the ticker that's based on system clock.
      Methods in io.grpc with parameters of type Deadline.Ticker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Deadline Deadline.after(long duration, TimeUnit units, Deadline.Ticker ticker)
      Create a deadline that will expire at the specified offset based on the given Deadline.Ticker.

    • Uses of Deadline.Ticker in io.grpc.inprocess

      Methods in io.grpc.inprocess with parameters of type Deadline.Ticker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InProcessServerBuilder InProcessServerBuilder.deadlineTicker(Deadline.Ticker ticker)
      Provides a custom deadline ticker that this server will use to create incoming Deadlines.
